rewards_reviews_editor.title: Rewards & Reviews Editor
rewards_reviews_editor.visibility_note: If hidden, the transaction won't show in any employee's transaction history, but the bucks will still be added/deducted from their total. Managers will still be able to see all transactions.
rewards_reviews_editor.reset_warning: Warning: Resetting bucks will set the balance to $0 and delete all transaction history. This action cannot be undone.
rewards_reviews_editor.reset_all_warning: This will reset ALL employees' McLoone's Bucks to $0 and delete ALL transaction history for everyone.
rewards_reviews_editor.reset_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset {{name}}'s McLoone's Bucks to $0? This will also delete all their transaction history. This action cannot be undone.
rewards_reviews_editor.reset_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset ALL employees' McLoone's Bucks to $0? This will also delete ALL transaction history for everyone. This action cannot be undone.
rewards_reviews_editor.reset_success: {{name}}'s McLoone's Bucks have been reset to $0 and all transactions deleted
rewards_reviews_editor.reset_all_success: All employees' McLoone's Bucks have been reset to $0 and all transactions deleted
rewards_reviews_editor.reset_all_error: Failed to reset all users bucks
rewards_reviews_editor.transaction_updated: Transaction updated successfully and user balance recalculated
rewards_reviews_editor.delete_transaction_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This will remove it from the history but will NOT affect {{name}}'s total balance.
rewards_reviews_editor.hide_transaction_confirm_show: Are you sure you want to show this transaction? This will show it to all employees in their recent transaction list but will NOT affect their total balance. Managers will still be able to see all transactions.
rewards_reviews_editor.hide_transaction_confirm_hide: Are you sure you want to hide this transaction? This will hide it from all employees in their recent transaction list but will NOT affect their total balance. Managers will still be able to see all transactions.
rewards_reviews_editor.delete_review_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this review?
